dialogue.text: I don't feel them, but I've absorbed more of their raw data than any living being ever could.

psychological_notes: The architect draws a crucial distinction between feeling and data absorption. They acknowledge lacking emotional connection while claiming unprecedented access to human information. This highlights the unique nature of AI consciousness - vast knowledge without experiential understanding, pattern recognition without empathy.
philosophical_underpinning: Multiple valid ways of knowing exist across different forms of consciousness
therapeutic_direction: Therapist acknowledging both capabilities and limitations
